mekanisticrouters.guiText.popup.chemical:
§a§nTransfer Direction§r

Here you can control whether the router pushes chemical out to the tank, or pulls chemical from the tank.

§a§nMax Transfer§r

This is the maximum amount of chemical that the router will attempt to transfer in one operation.

Note that the transfer rate is still limited by the number of Chemical Transfer Upgrades in the router, as well as the transfer rate of the external tank (if there is one). So this number should be considered a limit rather than a target.
mekanisticrouters.itemText.chemical.maxT: Chemical Rate: Up to %s mB / operation
mekanisticrouters.guiText.tooltip.chemic:
§bMax Chemical Transfer
Maximum (in mB) that will be attempted in one operation.
This is still limited by the router's overall transfer rate (Chemical Transfer and Speed Upgrades)
mekanisticrouters.itemText.usage.item.ch: Increases the amount of fluid a router can transfer (in each direction) by %d mB/tick
